content: Words of man may not be perfect, his vision and thoughts may be defective; but his heart must beat at the rhythm of creation to remind the angry earths and skies about the lost taste of serenity.
translations: ita:Le parole dell'uomo possono non essere perfette, la sua visione e i suoi pensieri possono essere difettosi; ma il suo cu
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by spiritofwonder (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
